entries.femaleVariant: Most important thing's communication. Y'know, soft skills.
Riiight. 'Cause some North Oak millionaire'll take me over a Kang Tao  sociopath because I know how to "listen."
You best believe it. If I were you, I'd get me a language converter. Never know – one day you're in North Oak, next day it's Delhi.
And be open-minded. One time I had to pretend to be a tourist 'cause the client didn't wanna draw attention.
So I had to swim laps in the anti-grav pool in orbit in nothin' else but some gonk swim trunks, no iron or nothin'.
What can ya do – client gets what the client pays for.
And the most important thing – never get used to the good life. 'Cause ya know, when you guard a millionaire, you eat like one, sleep like one.
But the second you start thinkin' this is it, that you're set for life, that you've made it to the top – BAM! They replace you, no warning, just like that.
And lemme guess, you end up right where we're standing.
